title: Spotted: Unreleased Tires from Specialized and Cadex, and New Zipp Wheels at Strade Bianche
content:
Specialized looks to have a pair of new tires on the way, as well as new gear from Cadex and Zipp.

Read the full article at Spotted: Unreleased Tires from Specialized and Cadex, and New Zipp Wheels at Strade Bianche on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
